headline: FirstEnergy (FE) Ordered to Pay Over $250 million in Penalties
summary: FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE:FE) is included among the 14 Best Utility Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE:FE)’s 10 electric distribution companies form one of America’s largest investor-owned electric systems, serving customers in Ohio, Pennsylvania, New Jersey, West Virginia, Maryland, and New York.
